connector-descriptor.name: Mulgara Connector
connector-descriptor.description: This connector is written for Mulgara 1.1.0 For more information on Mulgara, visit http://www.mulgara.org/

parameter.name: remote
parameter.label: Whether the triplestore is available via rmi.
parameter.description: This tells the connector to communicate with Kowari in remote or local mode.

parameter.name: host
parameter.label: The hostname where Kowari is running.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: The rmi port it's running on, if not 1099 (the default).

parameter.name: path
parameter.label: The local path to the main triplestore directory.

parameter.name: serverName
parameter.label: The server name for rmi binding.

parameter.name: modelName
parameter.label: The name of the model to use.

parameter.name: poolInitialSize
parameter.label: The initial size of the session pool used for queries.
parameter.description: If one or greater, pooling will be used. If zero, all read/write access will be synchronized and no buffering will be done.

parameter.name: poolMaxGrowth
parameter.label: Maximum number of additional sessions the pool may add.
parameter.description: If specified as -1, no limit will be placed on pool growth.

parameter.name: poolSpareSessions
parameter.label: The number of spare sessions to proactively make available.
parameter.description: If unspecified, this defaults to 0, which means that additional sessions will only be created as needed. Note that if poolMaxGrowth is 0, the value of this parameter is inconsequential.

parameter.name: readOnly
parameter.label: Whether to connect in read-only mode.
parameter.description: Read-only mode will prevent accidental changes to the triplestore.

parameter.name: autoCreate
parameter.label: Whether to create the model if it doesn't already exist.
parameter.description: At startup, the model will be automatically created. In addition, an XML schema datatyped model named "xsd" will also be automatically created.

parameter.name: autoTextIndex
parameter.label: Whether to propogate adds/deletes to a fulltext model automatically.
parameter.description: If true, the text model will be named modelName-fullText. Note that if this is true and autoCreate is true, the text model will also be created if it doesn't already exist.

parameter.name: autoFlushDormantSeconds
parameter.label: Seconds of buffer inactivity that will trigger an auto-flush.
parameter.description: If this threshold is reached, flushing will occur in the background, during which time the buffer is still available for writing.

parameter.name: autoFlushBufferSize
parameter.label: The size at which the buffer should be auto-flushed.
parameter.description: If this threshold is reached, flushing will occur in the background, during which time the buffer is still available for writing.

parameter.name: bufferSafeCapacity
parameter.label: The maximum size the buffer can reach before being forcibly flushed.
parameter.description: If this threshold is reached, flushing will occur in the foreground and the buffer will be locked for writing until it is finished. This should be larger than autoFlushBufferSize.

parameter.name: bufferFlushBatchSize
parameter.label: The number of updates to send to the triplestore at a time.
parameter.description: This should be the same size as, or smaller than autoFlushBufferSize.
